Judul: PENGEMBANGAN SPEKTROMETER FOURIER               MENGGUNAKAN RETROREFLEKTOR               YANG BEROTASI
Abstrak:
Fourier transform infra red spectroscopy (FTIR) is an important tool for identification and quantification molecular composition of materials, in particular of gases. This paper represents design and application of               
Fourier Spectroscopy for gas analysis using rotating retroreflector. Besides, some adventages the use of retroreflector versus conventional method will be shown.
Kata Kunci: transform infra red spectroscopy ,composition of materials,Fourier Spectroscopy for gas analysis
